Texts.Eng: I see you got your Kestrel license! ^green;Now we can upgrade your ship. If you bring me ^orange;4 upgrade modules ^green;I'll initiate the upgrade procedure.
I see you got your Serris license... ^green;we can upgrade your ship. If you bring me ^orange;4 upgrade modules ^green;I'll initiate the upgrade.
The upgrade is complete. Enjoy your new home... ^green;I suspect more people will be asking you for help now that you have a bigger ship...
